Docs.param: A instance containing parameters for creating the conversation ID.
Docs.summary: Creates a conversation id for a skill conversation.
Docs.returns: A unique conversation ID used to communicate with the skill.
Docs.remarks: It should be possible to use the returned string on a request URL and it should not contain special characters.
